_description: The Visit of the Magi — 96 lines in cross-rhymes quatrains with an introductory refrain, ‘The sterre shoon boþe nyȝt & day’

CantAdd68.First Lines:
Truth it is ful sekyrlyThre kyngges þat were ful
                    reuerentÞat sowth Ihesu ryȝth besylyWith holy deuocioun
                    & good intent…
CantAdd68.Last Lines:
…Where we Ioy may with owr kyneWith seyntes & anegell
                    euerych oneThe face off very god boþe three[?] & One[?]I
                    thank now god myn song is done
CantAdd68.Editions:

             A XVth Century Guide Book to the Principal Churches of Rome Compiled c.

Greene,  Richard Leighton.
